data.eml:eml: Revision of Calobrachium Gobbi & Azevedo, gen. nov. (Hymenoptera, Bethylidae), with description of seven new Oriental species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Gobbi, Fernanda T., Azevedo, Celso O. (2016): Revision of Calobrachium Gobbi & Azevedo, gen. nov. (Hymenoptera, Bethylidae), with description of seven new Oriental species. Zootaxa 4083 (2): 221-238, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4083.2.3
